Segment.comment: To specify resource authorizations (i.e., finished labor, material, etc.) in the planning schedule

Field.name: ResourceAuthorizationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the resource which the buyer is authorizing the seller to commit to

Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year
